short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jump, collect Dragon Balls, and reach new heights in DragonBall Jump! Play directly in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready to soar into the skies with DragonBall Jump Online! Play as your favorite Dragon Ball characters, jump from platform to platform, collect Dragon Balls, and avoid falling down. Challenge yourself to reach the highest level, directly from your browser.

Features:

Play as Dragon Ball Characters: Jump, fly, and reach new heights with your favorite characters from the Dragon Ball universe.
Exciting Levels: Navigate through fun and challenging levels that become more difficult as you ascend higher.
Collect Dragon Balls: Gather Dragon Balls while jumping to unlock special boosts and power-ups.
No Downloads Required: Play the game instantly in your browser without the need for downloads or installation.
Compete with Friends: Share your high scores and challenge your friends to see who can jump the highest!
Test your skills and enjoy endless fun in DragonBall Jump Online!
